data.name: elemental
data.detailed_description:
An abandoned chapel.
An old generator that won't start.
Someone or something else.
And not just one of them.

The nights here feel like weeks, but you have to endure it. You must find out the truth. About what? Even you don't really remember that well.

"elemental" is a survival horror game that takes the point and click mechanics of Five Nights at Freddy's and combines them with puzzles and minigames. Every night is different. Every night you have a different objective, with different puzzles. The one thing that stays the same is that you still have the keep 'them' away. At all costs. The question is, do you have what it takes?

data.short_description: 'elemental' is a psychological horror game where every detail matters. Prepare yourself for an experience in which your morals will be tested and your sanity condemned.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
